page.title: 01AIMS OF THE SURVEY
page.content: OUR AREA LIES BETWEEN THE TOWN OF HEATHFIELD AND THE SMALL TYPICAL SUSSEX VILLAGES OF MAYFIELD AND FIVE ASHES. THE AREA DOES NOT COMPRISE ANY OF THE BUILT UP AREAS AND CONSISTS MOSTLY OF FARMS AND ISOLATED HOUSES SET IN THE UNDULATING COUNTRYSIDE OF THE WEALD OF KENT AND SUSSEX. A FEW MINOR ROADS CRISS-CROSS THE AREA WITH THE DISUSED MAYFIELD TO HEATHFIELD RAILWAY LINE RUNNING NORTH / SOUTH. THE POPULATION CONSISTS OF FAIRLY PROSPEROUS FARMERS AND RETIRED PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE. OUR SURVEY WAS AIMING TO REFLECT THE WAY OF LIFE OF AN EAST SUSSEX RURAL COMMUNITY, THEIR USE OF THE LAND AND THEIR ATTITUDES TO LIFE. DESCRIPTIONS OF THE IMMEDIATE SURROUNDINGS AND A FEW TYPICAL HOUSES SHOULD ENABLE ONE TO GET A PICTURE OF THE VEGETATION, WILD LIFE AND OF THE LIVING CONDITIONS SURROUNDING US.
